title: Judge In Ray Rice Appeal Known For Being 'Down The Middle'
teaser: A profile of Barbara Jones, the independent arbiter who will preside over Ray Rice's grievance hearing this week. The former running back for the Baltimore Ravens is appealing his indefinite ban from the NFL for striking his fianc√©e in an elevator.
